metadata.title: USN-7108-1 -- AsyncSSH vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Fabian Bäumer, Marcus Brinkmann, and Jörg Schwenk discovered that the SSH protocol was vulnerable to a rogue extension negotiation attack. If a remote attacker was able to intercept SSH communications, extension info message could be replaced, possibly leading to certain algorithms and features being downgraded.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7108-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python-asyncssh-doc - 2.10.1-2ubuntu0.1+esm1 python3-asyncssh - 2.10.1-2ubuntu0.1+esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
